duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads the creation, analysis, and reporting of financial data necessary for effective and efficient pricing and monitoring of major lines of business and products.
Provides input into the development and revision of department cost allocation policies, procedures, and systems.
Directs the timely and accurate preparation of regulatory reports, analysis, forecasts, and operating plans.
Provides a critical review of operating expense allocations, reports, analysis, and projections.
Motivates staff to perform duties and provides formal and informal training that promotes staff development.
Accountable for instilling the process improvement mindset into day-to-day activities within larger team.
Drives change activities through the entire department that improve Cost Accounting's ability to meet the current and future demands of our customers.
Is viewed as a subject matter expert in all areas of Cost Allocations and proactively consults with both internal and external customers.
Provides both formal and informal training that promotes staff development.
Identify, diagnose, influence, and implement process improvement ideas that improve effectiveness and preserve the ability to meet the needs of customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Master's Degree preferred.
